page.title: 06DEVON DIALECT-POEM.
page.content:
"Thay dued it awl ver us" Twas a cold win'ters day,us six made our way, Tu the "Skuool"tu ave our,Din'ner, Thay d'aer,"Chil'ern"wus g'reat,Yer...twas a bootivul traet, Ver us"Old V'olks"tu s'hare sum'Teddies...ayss,an sum m'aet.
"They did it all for us" It was a cold winters day,we six made our way, To the"School"to have our dinner, Those dear"Children"were great, here...it was a beautiful treat, For we old folk to share in some"Potatoes,and yes,some meat."
Bill Daymond one of our senior citizen friends wrote this poem for us.Thank you Mr.Daymond.See you next week for lunch!
